overview: Bizarre, salacious story about a former fat singer getting herself killed by a host of possible candidates. It seems that Rachel has a thing for younger men including her own son. A terrible actor poses as a policeman and we hear various characters go through their whereabouts at the time of Rachel's demise as well going into detail about their relationships with her with him brooding over what they say.
tagline: “Oh, Rachel, my love, the lives you shatter… if you should die………. Would it really matter?”
title: Sins of Rachel
